title: The Two Headed Spy 1958 colorized (Jack Hawkins)

sources.title: The Two Headed Spy 1958 colorized (Jack Hawkins)
sources.description: A British agent planted long ago in the German Army continues passing information to the Allies during World War II, gaining the confidence of everyone in the Nazi high command except one suspicious officer. Inspired by A.P. Scotland's memoir "The London Cage". Jack Hawkins as Gen. Alex Schottland Gia Scala as Lili Geyr Erik Schumann as Lt. Reinisch Alexander Knox as Gestapo Leader MÃ¼ller Felix Aylmer as Cornaz Walter Hudd as Adm. Canaris Edward Underdown as Kaltenbrunner Laurence Naismith as Gen. Hauser Geoffrey Bayldon as Dietz Kenneth Griffith as Adolf Hitler Michael Caine as a Gestapo Agent If you have a request or a comment for me, please go to the Colorized Movies Forum at https://archive.org/details/colorized-movies?tab=forum I colorized this using AI software that doesn't always get the colors right, but I think it looks fairly natural. Hopefully a more professional job will be done someday.
